verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
His yoke is easy, His burden is light
I've found it so, I've found it so.
He leadeth me by day and by night
Where living waters flow.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The Lord is my shepherd, I shall not want
He maketh me down to lie, in pastures green,
He leadeth me the quiet waters be.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
My soul crieth out,
Restore me again and give me the
Strength to take the narrow path of righteousness
E'en for Thine Own Name's sake.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Yea, though I should walk the valley of death
Yet what should I fear from ill?
For Thou art with me,
And Thy rod and staff support me still.
